title: [Resolved] MAC LoL installer does not work
body:
Hi guys, 

3 days ago I uninstalled my LoL account, with the intention of immediately re installing, to remove a bug from my LoL client. 

After uninstalling, I downloaded the OCEANIA MAC OSX installer package, and it does not work. SO I restarted my computer, double checked my computer security settings, made sure I had removed all previous LoL software, and then, downloaded again...but it didn’t work. 

So just to confirm, I am now unable to install and play League of legends, and I have absolutely no idea why. 

Playssss halppppppp. 

Thanks, 
BETALEGEND {{champion:202}}

replies.body:
Hey there,

Are you sure you're attempting to install the client correctly?

Check out [this](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends#section-mac) page for more information.
Hi can you send me a link again that link is not wokring on my computer.

That link is still up, what error are you receiving?

Could you try switching to a public DNS for me, let me know if you can view the link then.

**CHANGING TO PUBLIC DNS**

* Open System Preferences
* Open the Network preference pane
* Select the active connection on the left, and click the "Advanced..." button in the lower right hand corner
* Click "DNS" from the selection bar.
* Remove any current DNS entries, and input the following public DNS servers:

> 8.8.8.8 
> 8.8.4.4

* Save your changes by selecting "OK"
* Apply the changes by clicking "Apply" in the lower right hand corner

Good to know that helped :)

See you on the Rift,
Seph
